 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָצַץ‎</span>] **verb** ==shine, sparkle== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִצְנֵץ‎</span>; akin to Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sparkle, flash***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְעָא‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְנֹצְצִים כְּעֵין נְחשֶׁת‎</span> [[Ezek.1.7|Ezek 1:7]] (of cherubim); — [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>Anal.45</sup> proposes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺצִיצָם‎</span> ***their plumage*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> \|\| form of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נוֺצָה‎</span>), compare [[BDB#Ew|Ew]].
